page.title: 09RECREATION
page.content: Some people in their spare time like to swim because it gives people pleasure.Girls often like play netball or go to dancing.Boys like to play football or cricket.Tennis,badminton or squash are often played in peoples spare time.Some people prefere to go pony treking.Other people like quieter things like quieter things like reading,drawing,writing storys and poems,watching television,playing on computers and playing board and electronic games.Some older women like things like kniting,sewing and other craft ideas because they can't move around very quickly.Some very athletic people like sports like parashuting, sky diving,deep sea diving,gliding and other sports like this.What type of thing do you like to do in your spare time?
